SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.main

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.main.Config
public class Config extends Object
Master configuration initializer and container.

Properties is designed to provide a generic container for extendability.

This can also be used to access syetm properties.

It will favor system properties over properties file values.

ServerConfig configuration holds the server config, authentication users and behaviour scenarios.

ClientConfig configuration holds the client defaults and routes.

See Also:

  • ServerConfig
  • ClientConfig

    • triggerReload

      public static void triggerReload()
      Triggers an immediate reload of configuration. This method executes the scheduled reload tasks immediately via the executor. Thread-safe and suitable for external trigger points like API endpoints.
